law.text: A fund for the purpose of carrying out the provisions of KRS 146.410 to 146.530 is hereby created and is designated the "Kentucky Nature Preserves Fund" and shall consist of all revenues derived from privileges, concessions, and contracts granted by the commission, and all moneys received by it from gifts, contributions, donations and grants from governmental or private sources, and moneys appropriated from general funds of the state for the purposes of KRS 146.410 to 146.530. The Kentucky nature preserves fund shall be disbursed by the commission, for administration and other expenses and for all purposes provided by KRS 146.410 to 146.530.
